body_html: @vrv In the caffe example you posted we have a description "Add ifdef in CuDNNConvolutionLayer for cuDNN v4". Can we recover some kind of info like this from Gerrit to put in the history. Actually I if want to move through the history I need to always check file changes of internal merges cause descriptions are uninformative.

body: @vrv In the caffe example you posted we have a description "Add ifdef in CuDNNConvolutionLayer for cuDNN v4". Can we recover some kind of info like this from Gerrit to put in the history. Actually I if want to move through the history I need to always check file changes of internal merges cause descriptions are uninformative.
